===Etymology===
[[abbreviation|Abbreviation]] of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=しでん|市営|tr1=shiei|t1=municipal, operated by the city|電車|tr2=densha|t2=electric train}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

Alternately, abbreviation of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=しでん|市内|tr1=shinai|t1=within a city, intracity|電車|tr2=densha|t2=electric train}}.<ref name="KDJ"/><ref name="DJR"/>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|しでん|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しでん}}

# {{abbreviation of|lang=ja|sort=しでん|市営電車|dot=:}} a [[municipal]] ([[electric]]) [[train]], a train operated by the city government
# {{abbreviation of|lang=ja|sort=しでん|市内電車|dot=:}} a [[tram]], a [[streetcar]]
